name: The Fairrie’s Paphiopedilum Of Mundi
description:
"Iron rusts from disuse; stagnant water loses its purity and in cold weather becomes frozen; even so does inaction sap the vigor of the mind. So we must stretch ourselves to the very limits of human possibility. Anything less is a sin against both God and man."

*a tribute to one of the masterpieces of the maestro Leonardo da Vinci, the most expensive painting entitled "Salvator Mundi"

in my nft work this time I stacked it with a bouquet of the rarest orchid Fairrie's Paphiopedilum.
